text: Narendra Chandra Debbarma (28 August 1942 â€“ 1 January 2023) was an Indian politician for the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). He served in the Tripura Legislative Assembly from 2018 until his death in 2023. He was also president of the Indigenous Peoples Front of Tripura and a director of All India Radio. He was born in Agartala. On 30 December 2022, Debbarma was taken to a Agartala hospital after having a stroke. He died on 1 January 2023, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Disease-related deaths in India Category:Deaths from stroke
title: N. C. Debbarma
